message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $13,000. I think it could really benefit you and its value is well worth the price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure if I can go any higher than that.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value to me is quite high.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,250?
I'm still interested in the product, but $11,250 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $9,000, but that's as high as I can go.
